caption:
This photograph captures a vibrant city street bustling with activity, likely taken in the mid-20th century. The scene is set on a sunny day with clear skies, and the street is lined with tall buildings exhibiting architectural styles from the period. The domed building visible in the background adds a classical element to the cityscape.

The street is busy with traffic; numerous cars of various models and colors traverse the road, which features tram tracks running down its center. A red and white tram is visible in the midst of moving down these tracks, sharing the road with the cars. Many of the vehicles, including a prominent yellow Volkswagen Beetle, are reflective of the automotive designs prevalent from the 1950s to 1970s.

Traffic direction and control signs are prominently displayed in the foreground, indicating rules and directions for drivers. These signs, alongside street lamps and tram wires overhead, contribute to a sense of urban organization and movement.

Overall, the photograph captures a moment in urban life, showcasing the dynamics of city traffic and architectural styles of a bygone era.
title: The ringstrasse, which encircles the inner city, has been made a one-way street for all vehicles except trolleys
